meanings.definition: A person who lays something in or on something else.
meanings.sent1: The skilled inlayers carefully placed the tiles in the mosaic.
meanings.sent2: The inlayers added intricate designs to the wooden furniture.
meanings.sent3: The inlayers decided to have a competition to see who could lay the most tiles in an hour.
meanings.sent4: She was an inlayers of emotions, carefully placing each feeling in its designated spot.
meanings.sent5: The inlayers transformed the plain floor into a work of art with their tile designs.

meanings.sent1: The team of inlayers worked together to create a beautiful pattern on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The inlayers were known for their attention to detail and precision.
meanings.sent3: The inlayers gathered for a meeting to discuss their upcoming projects.
meanings.sent4: In the world of art, the inlayers are often unsung heroes behind the masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The inlayers' craftsmanship was evident in every piece they worked on.
